arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" as \\"NECK_PROC_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_NECK_WS.\\"PROC_START_IDLE_DATE\\", 'FM999990') as \\"PROC_START_IDLE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_NECK_WS.\\"UNIT_LOAD\\", 'FM9990.09') as \\"UNIT_LOAD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_LT\\") as \\"NECK_PROC_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_NECK_WS.\\"LOAD_ASSIGN_TYP\\") as \\"LOAD_ASSIGN_TYP\\", " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_NAME\\" as \\"NECK_PROC_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CAPA\\", 'FM99999990.09') as \\"NECK_PROC_CAPA\\", " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CAPA_UNIT\\" as \\"NECK_PROC_CAPA_UNIT\\", " +" ODRTYP.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" NIGI.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\") as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\") as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_CD\\" as \\"PROC_CD\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" NIGI2.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_M\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_PROC_GRP.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_PROC_GRP.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_NECK_WS.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_NECK_WS, " +" M_RESOURCE, " +" M_ITEM, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'OUTSIDE_TYP') NIGI, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'MRP_ODR_TYP') ODRTYP, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'OUTSIDE_TYP') NIGI2, " +" M_PROC_GRP " +"where " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = M_RESOURCE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = M_PROC_GRP.\\"PLANT_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = NIGI.\\"VALUE\\"(+) " +" and M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = ODRTYP.\\"VALUE\\"(+) " +" and M_PROC_GRP.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = NIGI2.\\"VALUE\\"(+) " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" COUNT(*) as CNT " +"from " +" M_NECK_WS " +"where " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_NECK_WS " +"where " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ? " +"for update"

"update " +" M_NECK_WS " +"set " +" \\"PROC_START_IDLE_DATE\\" = ?, " +" \\"UNIT_LOAD\\" = ?, " +" \\"NECK_PROC_LT\\" = ?, " +" \\"LOAD_ASSIGN_TYP\\" = ? " +"where " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"delete from " +" M_NECK_WS " +"where " +" M_NECK_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_NECK_WS.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" COUNT(*) as \\"CNT_NECK_PROC_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_RESOURCE " +"where " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"LOAD_CD\\" as \\"LOAD_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_LOAD_DETAIL " +"where " +" T_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_SIM_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"LOAD_CD\\" as \\"LOAD_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_SIM_LOAD_DETAIL " +"where " +" T_SIM_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SIM_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SIM_LOAD_DETAIL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" ITEM.ITEM_NAME as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" ODRTYP.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" NIGI.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\" as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\" as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\" as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\" as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_CD\\" as \\"PROC_CD\\", " +" PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" PROC_GRP.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" NIGI2.\\"VALUE\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_M\\", " +" PROC_GRP.\\"FIXED_LT\\" as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" PROC_GRP.\\"SAFETY_LT\\" as \\"SAFETY_LT\\" " +"from " +"(select " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\") as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\") as \\"ISSUE_LT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?) ITEM, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'OUTSIDE_TYP') NIGI, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'MRP_ODR_TYP') ODRTYP, " +"(select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\", " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'OUTSIDE_TYP') NIGI2, " +"(select " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_CD\\" as \\"PROC_CD\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_PROC_GRP.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_PROC_GRP.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\" " +"from " +" M_PROC_GRP " +"where M_PROC_GRP.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?) PROC_GRP " +"where ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = NIGI.\\"VALUE\\"(+) " +" and ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = ODRTYP.\\"VALUE\\"(+) " +" and PROC_GRP.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = NIGI2.\\"VALUE\\"(+)"

"select " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_NAME\\" as \\"NECK_PROC_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CAPA\\", 'FM9990.09') as \\"NECK_PROC_CAPA\\", " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CAPA_UNIT\\" as \\"NECK_PROC_CAPA_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" M_RESOURCE " +"where " +" M_RESOURCE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_RESOURCE.\\"NECK_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

cell.name: LOAD_ASSIGN_TYP_name
cell.description: 負荷割当コンボボックスの名称を保持する

cell.name: LOAD_ASSIGN_TYP_val
cell.description: 負荷割当コンボボックスの値を保持する

cell.name: h_ITEM_CD
cell.description: 更新検査用に品目番号を保持する

cell.name: h_NECK_PROC_CD
cell.description: 更新検査用に制約工程コードを保持する
